component.text: This is a link to the Cisco Software Application Support Services page on the Cisco website. http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/svcs/ps3034/ps2827/ps2993/serv_group_home.html This PDF document provides an overview of Cisco's Software Application Support Services from a customer's perspective. http://www.cisco.com/application/pdf/en/us/guest/products/ps2993/c1267/cdccont_0900aecd804039ad.pdf
